# [Phase 10] Blog Article & Marketing Launch

## Parent Epic

Part of #836 - Spike Land Pivot

## User Request

Create blog article announcing the pivot and execute marketing launch

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Write blog article: "I Built the Perfect Developer Tool - Then Realized Nobody Could Find It"
- [ ] Prepare Product Hunt launch materials
- [ ] Create Twitter thread content
- [ ] Create LinkedIn post content
- [ ] Prepare case study templates
- [ ] Document marketing launch sequence

## Blog Article Outline

**Title:** "I Built the Perfect Developer Tool - Then Realized Nobody Could Find It"
**Author:** Zoltan Erdos, Founder of Spike Land

1. **The Developer's Dilemma** - Built vibe coding platform, great tech, no users
2. **The Marketing Wake-Up Call** - "If you build it, they will come" is a lie
3. **Building My Own Solution** - Created Orbit to manage my own marketing
4. **The Pivot** - From developer tool to creator platform
5. **What's Different Now** - AI-Powered Social Media Command Center
6. **The Future** - 3-month marketing push starts now

**Key Quote:** "You can build the best vibe coding app - if no one knows about it, you're doomed."

## Marketing Launch Sequence

| Week | Activity                                                   |
| ---- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| 1-2  | Soft launch - update branding, invite existing users       |
| 3-4  | Content marketing - blog post, Twitter thread, LinkedIn    |
| 5-6  | Product Hunt launch                                        |
| 7-8  | Paid advertising (Facebook, Instagram, Google)             |
| 9+   | Sustained marketing - weekly blogs, case studies, webinars |

## Files Expected to Create

- `docs/blog/pivot-announcement.md`
- `docs/marketing/product-hunt-materials.md`
- `docs/marketing/social-content.md`

## Out of Scope

- Actual ad spend/campaign execution
- Ongoing content marketing beyond initial launch
